name: Hat of Vermin
description: This hat has 3 charges. While holding the hat, you can take a Magic action to expend 1 of its charges and pull a bat, a frog, or a rat out of the hat. The pulled creature is ordinary, appears in your hand, and is not under your control. It vanishes after 1 hour or when it drops to 0 Hit Points. The hat regains 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn.
